section.section: An applicant for a garage license shall pay to the clerk a license fee based on the floor area of each garage.
In Baltimore City or Baltimore County, the license fee is $6 for each 100 square feet of each garage.

text.section:
The floor area on which the license fee is based is the total floor area of all floors of the garage, excluding:
the space occupied by a machine shop that is defined by permanent partitions; and
the floor area of a space 15 feet wide and extending the entire length or depth of the garage on each floor on which a law requires that a space be kept open.
